languages.text: Не сказав никому и слова, Вольный Торговец сквозь дым, пар и завалы пробирается к выходу. Сервочереп неотступно следует за {mf|ним|ней}: в кадре — спина Лорд-капитана, вокс фиксирует крики боли и кашель откуда-то со стороны.

traits.locale_text: Не сказав никому и слова, Вольный Торговец хватает плазмо-пилу и сквозь дым, пар и завалы пробирается к одному из лифтов. Команда теряет капитан из виду, начинается паника. Офицеры задыхаются, кричат от боли и с кашлем выплевывают на пол кровавые внутренности.

languages.text: Without saying a word to anyone, the Rogue Trader makes for the exit through the smoke, steam, and rubble. The servo-skull is right behind {mf|him|her} — the Lord Captain's back is in the frame, the vox is picking up screams of pain and coughing coming from somewhere off to one side.
languages.original_text: Не сказав никому и слова, Вольный Торговец сквозь дым, пар и завалы пробирается к выходу. Сервочереп неотступно следует за {mf|ним|ней}: в кадре — спина Лорд-капитана, вокс фиксирует крики боли и кашель откуда-то со стороны.

The servo-skull is right behind {mf|him|her} — the Lord Captain's back is in the frame, the vox is picking up screams of pain and coughing coming from somewhere to the side.

Without saying a word to anyone, the Rogue Trader makes for the exit through the smoke, steam, and rubble. The servo-skull is right behind {mf|him|her} — the Lord Captain's back is in the frame, the vox is picking up screams of pain and coughing coming from somewhere off to one side.

languages.text: Sin decir nada, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se dirige a la salida, atravesando el humo, el vapor y los escombros. El servocráneo {mf|le|la} sigue de cerca, grabando la espalda de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Por el voco se oyen gritos de dolor y toses procedentes de un lateral.
languages.original_text: Without saying a word to anyone, the Rogue Trader makes for the exit through the smoke, steam, and rubble. The servo-skull is right behind {mf|him|her} — the Lord Captain's back is in the frame, the vox is picking up screams of pain and coughing coming from somewhere off to one side.

traits.locale_text: Sin decir nada, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se dirige a la salida, atravesando el humo, el vapor y los escombros. El servocráneo {mf|le|la} sigue de cerca, grabando la espalda de{mf|l| la} L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}. Por el voco se oyen gritos de dolor y toses procedentes de un lateral.

languages.text: 行商浪人没有和任何人说任何话，就穿过了烟尘、蒸气与碎屑，朝出口的方向跑了过去，伺服头骨跟在{mf|他|她}身后。画面中出现了领主舰长的背影，旁边的音阵系统中传来了痛苦的尖叫声与咳嗽声。
languages.original_text: Without saying a word to anyone, the Rogue Trader makes for the exit through the smoke, steam, and rubble. The servo-skull is right behind {mf|him|her} — the Lord Captain's back is in the frame, the vox is picking up screams of pain and coughing coming from somewhere off to one side.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人没有和任何人说任何话，就穿过了烟尘、蒸气与碎屑，朝出口的方向跑了过去，伺服头骨跟在{mf|他|她}身后。画面中出现了领主舰长的背影，旁边的音阵系统中传来了痛苦的尖叫声与咳嗽声。

languages.text: 自由開拓者は何も言わずに、煙と蒸気と瓦礫の中を通って出口へと向かう。サーヴォスカルはそのすぐ後ろに付いている。ロード・キャプテンの背中はフレームに映っており、ヴォクスはどこか片方から聞こえるゴホゴホと痛さで叫ぶ声を拾っている。
languages.original_text: Without saying a word to anyone, the Rogue Trader makes for the exit through the smoke, steam, and rubble. The servo-skull is right behind {mf|him|her} — the Lord Captain's back is in the frame, the vox is picking up screams of pain and coughing coming from somewhere off to one side.

traits.locale_text: 自由開拓者は何も言わずに、煙と蒸気と瓦礫の中を通って出口へと向かう。サーヴォスカルはそのすぐ後ろに付いている。ロード・キャプテンの背中はフレームに映っており、ヴォクスはどこか片方から聞こえるゴホゴホと痛さで叫ぶ声を拾っている。

languages.text: Ohne ein Wort zu sagen, macht sich {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} auf den Weg zum Ausgang durch Rauch, Dampf und Trümmer. Der Servoschädel ist direkt hinter ihm ... der Rücken des Lord Captains ist im Bild, das Vox-Gerät empfängt Schmerzensschreie und Husten von den Seiten.
languages.original_text: Without saying a word to anyone, the Rogue Trader makes for the exit through the smoke, steam, and rubble. The servo-skull is right behind {mf|him|her} — the Lord Captain's back is in the frame, the vox is picking up screams of pain and coughing coming from somewhere off to one side.

languages.text: Sans dire un mot, {name} se rue vers la sortie à travers la fumée, la vapeur et les décombres, {mf|suivi|suivie} de près par le servocrâne. Sur la pictocapture, qui montre le dos {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, on entend des gens crier de douleur et tousser non loin.
languages.original_text: Without saying a word to anyone, the Rogue Trader makes for the exit through the smoke, steam, and rubble. The servo-skull is right behind {mf|him|her} — the Lord Captain's back is in the frame, the vox is picking up screams of pain and coughing coming from somewhere off to one side.

traits.locale_text: Sans dire un mot, {name} se rue vers la sortie à travers la fumée, la vapeur et les décombres, {mf|suivi|suivie} de près par le servocrâne. Sur la pictocapture, qui montre le dos {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, on entend des gens crier de douleur et tousser non loin.

languages.text: Hür Tacir, kimseye tek kelime etmeden duman, buhar ve molozların arasından çıkışa doğru ilerliyor. Hizmelet de Lord Kaptan'ı sırtından izliyor. Voks, bir yerlerden acı çığlıkları ve öksürük sesleri alıyor.
languages.original_text: Without saying a word to anyone, the Rogue Trader makes for the exit through the smoke, steam, and rubble. The servo-skull is right behind {mf|him|her} — the Lord Captain's back is in the frame, the vox is picking up screams of pain and coughing coming from somewhere off to one side.
